授業目的: This course will focus on developing the skills necessary to effectively write academic papers, with a specific emphasis on research summary writing. By the end of the class, students will have the ability to understand and critically analyze a range of sources and be able to produce their own research summary paper as a capstone project.
到達目標:
To be able to plan for and prepare a research summary paper
To be able to use academic language and paragraph structure in a research report on a topic of interest
To be able to avoid plagiarism by properly citing outside sources and references
To understand the importance of drafting and peer review in the academic writing process
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This class will consist of a mixture of individual work on assignments, group discussions, and presentations.
